basic.description: This course develops an understanding of the scientific approach to the development of knowledge; analyzes historical and social factors associated with theory construction; gives exposure to research and writings in the area of theory development; utilizes conceptual tools to develop theories; increases understanding of ways to critique theories; analyzes the progression of ideas through the accomplishments of a prominent theorist; engages in the exploration of epistemological issues through the creation of a theory of the student's choice.
basic.subject: LIS
basic.title: Issues in Theory Development
